About.paragraph: The first-ever Vietnam Global Brand Summit™ 2024 is set to take place in Ho Chi Minh City, focusing on the imperative themes of sustainability with the pioneering Brand-Led Sustainability™ approach. The summit features an impressive lineup of policymakers, global and Vietnamese brand innovators, international industry leaders, sustainability experts, and influencers. It promises to be a groundbreaking series of events, offering deep insights into brand-led sustainability and its impact on consumer behavior and business growth globally.

Services.name: BECOME a pioneer in brand-led sustainabilityTM to creating impact that changes consumers behaviors.
Services.text: LEARN with Mr. Nick Craig from the global 'The Purpose to Impact' program, for Brand-led SustainabilityTM starting with Mindset.

Services.name: LEARN meaningful sustainability innovations that drive brand’s growth in both Vietnam and Globally through Real Cases and Public Exhibition.
Services.text: MEET top game-changers from thought leaders, sustainability influencers, brand game changers, practitioners, policies makers to inspire, share, learn, network together.

Services.name: LEARN insights on marketing drivers that change consumers behaviors toward sustainable brands from top brands in the world and the regions.
Services.text: LEARN insights of the Top 100 most valuable brands in Vietnam and how they increase brand value by driving brand sustainability.

Contact.address: Tầng 9, Tòa nhà Empress Tower, 138-142 Hai Bà Trưng, P.Đa Kao, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Features.title: WORKSHOP
Features.subtitle: Transform Your Impact - Explore Your Path to Purpose-Driven Leadership
Features.text: The Purpose to Impact™ Program is a transformative experience that helps leaders and their teams to uncover the unique gift they bring to the world—their purpose.

Features.title: FORUM
Features.subtitle: Brand-led Sustainability™ Forum
Features.text: An opportunity to meet, learn and collect valuable and actionable insights from Brand-led Sustainability™ game-changers, industry leaders, and forward-thinking practitioners across various sectors.

Features.title: EXHIBITION
Features.subtitle: Feedback Loops International Art Exhibition
Features.text: The exhibition gathers 40 artists from various countries around the world as well as collectives and brands collaborating to explore different sustainable models, creating a space where art, technology, and society intersect.

Features.title: AWARD
Features.subtitle: Kotler Awards
Features.text: Kotler Awards are developed to honour true excellence in the field of marketing and business management around the world. Kotler Award recognizes top marketing, communications, and business management professionals.
